string.text:
%c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] placeable item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] Compatible with the craftable doorways
 %c[0,250,250,0] • %c[0,250,250,0] NOTICE: To remove the door stab it with a melee weapon or use explosive. Shooting it works too but requires a lot of bullets (for the purpose of preventing NPCs from breaking doors easly when shooting).
